alfredsnippet.snippet:
The Nature of the Physical World, Sir A. Eddington (1928), p.286

"Like the systems of Euclid, of Ptolemy, of Newton, which have served their turn, so the systems of Einstein and Heisenberg may give way to some fuller realization of the world."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Eddington on Something Better than Einstein and Heisenberg
